ComicInfo.Summary:
The Brain Robbers!: Johnny Peril stops the evil computer Cerbrex from taking over the Earth.
Burn, Match, Burn!: A mystical book of matches changes the life of whomever strikes them.
The Corpse That Didn't Die!: When a mugger steals his wallet and then dies, Cyrus Marshall is allowed to attend his own funeral to see how he'll be remembered.
ComicInfo.Title: The Brain Robbers!; Burn, Match, Burn!; The Corpse That Didn't Die!
